oneOf.title: Key Pair Authentication
oneOf.description: Configuration details for the Key Pair Authentication.

private_key.description: RSA Private key to use for Snowflake connection. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
private_key.title: Private Key

oneOf.title: Username and Password
oneOf.description: Configuration details for the Username and Password Authentication.

password.description: Enter the password associated with the username.
password.title: Password

credentials.description: Determines the type of authentication that should be used.
credentials.title: Authorization Method

host.description: Enter your Snowflake account's locator (in the format ...snowflakecomputing.com)
host.title: Host

role.description: Enter the role that you want to use to access Snowflake
role.title: Role

warehouse.description: Enter the name of the warehouse that you want to use as a compute cluster
warehouse.title: Warehouse

database.description: Enter the name of the database you want to sync data into
database.title: Database

schema.description: Enter the name of the default schema
schema.title: Default Schema

username.description: Enter the name of the user you want to use to access the database
username.title: Username

cdc_deletion_mode.description: Whether to execute CDC deletions as hard deletes (i.e. propagate source deletions to the destination), or soft deletes (i.e. leave a tombstone record in the destination). Defaults to hard deletes.
cdc_deletion_mode.title: CDC deletion mode

disable_type_dedupe.description: Write the legacy "raw tables" format, to enable backwards compatibility with older versions of this connector.
disable_type_dedupe.title: Legacy raw tables

raw_data_dataset.description: Airbyte will use this dataset for various internal tables. In legacy raw tables mode, the raw tables will be stored in this dataset. Defaults to "airbyte_internal".
raw_data_dataset.title: Airbyte Internal Table Dataset Name

jdbc_url_params.description: Enter the additional properties to pass to the JDBC URL string when connecting to the database (formatted as key=value pairs separated by the symbol &). Example: key1=value1&key2=value2&key3=value3
jdbc_url_params.title: JDBC URL Params

retention_period_days.description: The number of days of Snowflake Time Travel to enable on the tables. See Snowflake's documentation for more information. Setting a nonzero value will incur increased storage costs in your Snowflake instance.
retention_period_days.title: Data Retention Period (days)

use_merge_for_upsert.description: Use MERGE for de-duplication of final tables. This option no effect if Final tables are disabled or Sync mode is not DEDUPE
use_merge_for_upsert.title: Use MERGE for De-duplication of final tables
